assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Lumasiran_Outcomes_to_Treatment_Q2
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Where Response is defined as: a. For patients in whom urinary oxalate can be measured (including patients with ESKD): Lowering 24-hour urine oxalate to less than 1.5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN); or b. For children who are not continent: 30$Vlocity.Percent reduction in spot oxalate:creatinine ratio; or c. For patients on dialysis: 15$Vlocity.Percent reduction in plasma oxalate level
